WorkItem.ClosedComment: Not relevant. ShadowPriest isn't really updated for Cata AND this is a non-issue as previously described
WorkItem.Description:
If the pvp set items are available, the optimizer seems to ignore the hit cap and just returns with the max DPS set without hit capping.
Could not find any settings to make the optimizer always hit cap (using spirit and +hit items) for pve raiding.
Â 
Also, the model seems to suggest sometimes a spirit -> hit reforge, which is pointless for shadowpriests, in fact, it is against the optimum due to spirit = hit (with 2 points in the Twisted Faith talent).
WorkItem.Summary: [ShadowPriest] Hit Rating not kept at max

Comments.Message:
The model is far from finished im afraid, am hoping to put some time into it soon but whenever i try to sit down to do some work something else appears requiring my attention.

Sorry for the delay!

I am no expert, but.. I would guess that HIT efects the return (and dps) the the Shadowfiend, while Spirit does not - (Boomkin have the same issue with their Trees when it comes to Hit Vs Spirit).  This COULD cause Hit to have a (very slight) advantage to DPS over Spirit.
